definition: energy left over (to do sth else)
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities
see 心有餘而力不足|心有余而力不足[xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2]

sentences.english: All it will take is a will to be ambitious and a determination to leave no stone unturned.
sentences.chinese: 這需要野心和不遺餘力的決心。

sentences.english: Many educationists think highly of the aesthetic education and try their best to advocate it.
sentences.chinese: 許多教育家都重視美育，不遺餘力地提倡美育。
儘管他們不遺餘力救災，但還是有11萬人殞命。

sentences.english: Developed nations should spare no effort to finance their economically disadvantaged counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 發達國家應該不遺餘力地資助貧國。

sentences.english: She was unstinting in her efforts to help.
sentences.chinese: 她不遺餘力地提供援助。

sentences.english: This is because there will be little energy left to fight any external threat.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它已沒有多少餘力，可用來應付外在威脅了。

sentences.english: The city’s leading politicians have wasted little time in condemning this latest killing.
sentences.chinese: 該市主要的政治家不遺餘力地譴責這起最新的謀殺。

sentences.english: They would do anything to accomplish their goals.
sentences.chinese: 他們會不遺餘力地實現目標。

sentences.english: Provides the flawless sense of hearing for the net friend to enjoy sparely no effort.
sentences.chinese: 爲網友提供至善至美的聽覺享受不遺餘力。

sentences.english: Do you have reserve power to do more?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有餘力去做更多的事情？

sentences.english: In order to raise more funds before, Biden also spared no effort.
sentences.chinese: 爲了在此之前籌集到更多資金，拜登也不遺餘力。

sentences.english: The Green's spared no efforts on their daughter's wedding reception.
sentences.chinese: 格林夫婦不予餘力地操辦女兒的婚事。

sentences.english: YOS, in particular, should spare no efforts to push forward.
sentences.chinese: 黃老鞋尤其應該不遺餘力勇往直前。

sentences.english: We should make all our efforts to improve our environment.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該不遺餘力地美化我們的環境。

sentences.english: We spare no efforts in endeavoring to be of service to you.
sentences.chinese: 我方將不遺餘力爲貴方效勞。

sentences.english: Yu is the regular cinematographer of leading director Jia Zhang-ke.
sentences.chinese: 餘力爲是知名導演賈樟柯的御用攝影師。

definition: to develop/to make full use of
to make a contribution/to establish/to found/contribution
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
